name: Eros-SVMs
paper: Anomaly Detection using Similaritybased One-Class SVM for Network Traffic Characterization
description: Eros-SVMs is based on OCSVM appraoch and use a similarity index for Multivariate Time Series (MTS) called EROS (Extended Frobenius Norm). The results of the model are evaluated iterativelly for different hyper-parameters of OCSVM and the model that evaluates best is selected.
bibtex: @inproceedings{Lamrini2018AnomalyDU,title={Anomaly Detection using Similarity-based One-Class SVM for Network Traffic Characterization},author={Bouchra Lamrini and Augustin Gjini and Simon Daudin and Pascal Pratmarty and François Armando and Louise Trave-Massuyes},booktitle={Workshop on Principles of Diagnosis},year={2018},}
